name: Daniel Kifer
content: Daniel Kifer - Penn State Dan Kifer Professor Department of Computer Science & Engineering Penn State 333W Westgate Building (formerly IST) University Park, PA 16802 Fax: 814-865-7647 Research Interests Recent projects include: statistical privacy (e.g., differential privacy) and its interactions with software security, statistical inference, and numerical optimization. deep learning algorithms and applications to the physical sciences Applications to social science data (e.g., Census data, Labor statistics data, etc.) Recruiting I am looking for PhD and Masters applicants, who like both math and like programming, for projects on statistical privacy. Please apply through the Penn State application portal (unfortunately I am not able to reply to every email). Teaching (current courses) CMPSC/DS 410: Programming Models for Big Data. Publications The list below is out of date. Fortunately, Google Scholar and DBLP have updated lists. Old Publications Songshan Yang Jiawei Wen Xiang Zhan Daniel Kifer.
